pkgmetadata.longdescription: Advanced and Parallel Random Number Generation via 'TRNG' // Embeds sources and headers from Tina's Random Number Generator ('TRNG') C++ library. Exposes some functionality for easier access, testing and benchmarking into R. Provides examples of how to use parallel RNG with 'RcppParallel'. The methods and techniques behind 'TRNG' are illustrated in the package vignettes and examples. Full documentation is available in Bauke (2021) https://github.com/rabauke/trng4/blob/v4.23.1/doc/trng.pdf.
